value.title: AI Helps Auto Insurers Cost Out Collisions in Seconds
value.excerpt: Auto insurer USAA is among four national carriers that have started using a cloud-based artificial-intelligence platform designed to tally the cost of fender benders and other collisions within seconds,

value.title: Activeloop snags $5M seed to build streaming database for AI applications
value.excerpt: Activeloop, a member of the Y Combinator summer 2018 cohort, is building a database specifically designed for media-focused  artificial intelligence applications. Today the company announced a $5 million seed investment led by 468 Capital and CM Ventures with participation from Tribe Capital,

value.title: Reducing city transport emissions with Maps and AI
value.excerpt: City transportation is crucial to connecting residents to education, employment and essential services. value.title: Israeli AI Mobility Company Autobrains Raises $101M In Series C Funding
value.excerpt: Autobrains is disrupting advanced driver-assistance systems and the autonomous vehicle marketplace with its approach to AI for automation.

value.title: Robot food delivery, coming soon to a campus near you
value.excerpt: Robots navigate the Bowling Green State University campus in Bowling Green, Ohio on Thursday, Oct. 13, 2021. Robot food delivery is no longer the stuff of science fiction. Hundreds of little robots __ knee-high and able to hold around four large pizzas __ are now navigating college campuses and even some city sidewalks in the U.

value.title: NeuReality and IBM team up to develop AI inference platforms
value.excerpt: NeuReality has signed an agreement with IBM to develop the next generation of high-performance AI inference platforms.

value.title: Why AI still needs humans in the loop, at least for now
value.excerpt: If AI-generated writing becomes indistinguishable from human writing, we'll still need to check it carefully enough to see the mistakes

value.title: Pharma startup Quris aims to use a ‘patient on a chip’ to target drug delivery
value.excerpt: Pharma startup Quris aims to use AI, knowledge of the human genome, and a "patient on a chip" to improve drug delivery.

value.title: ReSkin aims to give AI a sense of touch
value.excerpt: Humans take the sense of touch for granted, and it’s one of the most important types of input that we get in certain situations. Our sense of touch allows us to do things like feel how we

value.title: Henry Kissinger and Eric Schmidt on the Perils of Military Brinkmanship in the Age of AI
value.excerpt: In this excerpt from their book, Kissinger, Schmidt, and Huttenlocher consider the transformations AI will impose on the planning, preparation and conduct of war. They conclude that humans remain essential to the equation.

value.title: How AI Creates Synthetic Speech
value.excerpt: What is different these days is that the quality of synthesized speech is improving, thanks to several companies using AI to create voice skins for enterprise companies and content creators that give more options for turning text into speech.

value.title: Of Global Execs Using AI, Over 75% Report AI Improves Team Culture
value.excerpt: More than 75% of managers who reported that their artificial intelligence implementations improved their team's decision-making and efficiency also saw improvements in collective learning (87%), team morale (79%),

value.title: Copy.ai Raises $11M To Accelerate AI Helping You Build Your Business
value.excerpt: Everyone thinks that artificial intelligence will replace humans. Chris Lu and Paul Yacoubian think otherwise. The two have raised $11M to further develop their AI-powered software, Copy.ai, to unleash human creativity.

value.title: Ford Taps Non-IT Professionals to Broaden Its AI Expertise
value.excerpt: The auto maker has trained more than 1,000 employees on a platform it developed to put AI tools in the hands of people across the company.

value.title: The Challenge of Being Human in the Age of AI
value.excerpt: Reason is our primary means of understanding the world. How does that change if machines think?

value.title: 'Cooperative Perception' Could Help Autonomous Vehicles See Pedestrians Around Corners
value.excerpt: New technology developed by researchers in Australia could help self-driving vehicles steer clear of pedestrians and cyclists without a direct line of sight, according to researchers from University researchers.

value.title: Untether AI Touts “At-Memory” Architecture, Promising Efficiency And Performance At The Edge
value.excerpt: Untether AI recently emerged from stealth and described their architecture as being “At-Memory”, which the company claims will deliver leading performance and power efficiency. Most products that claim the latter deliver relatively weak performance (with the exception of Qualcomm’s CloudAI 100).

value.title: Key to resilient energy-efficient AI/machine learning may reside in human brain
value.excerpt: A clearer understanding of how a type of brain cell known as astrocytes function and can be emulated in the physics of hardware devices, may result in artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning that autonomously self-repairs and consumes much less energy than the technologies currently do,

value.title: AI-powered camera surveys scenes to auto capture memorable moments
value.excerpt: Canon turned to the Japanese crowd to fund development and production of an AI-powered photo/video camera that automatically captures scenes unfolding in front of it. Now the company has launched the device in Europe as the PowerShot PX.

value.title: Sapiens Author Warns That Human Brains Could Be Hacked if AI Is Not Regulated
value.excerpt: World-renowned science author Yuval Noah Harari said that someday human brains could be hacked into if emerging AI systems are not properly regulated.

value.title: Dump Truck Accident Pours Liquid Asphalt From Overpass Onto Vehicles Below, Providing Lessons For AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: The recent news report about a dump truck that inadvertently spewed hot asphalt from an overpass onto a freeway is closely examined, and lessons for AI-based self-driving cars are gleaned from the harrowing event.

value.title: OctoML raises $85M for it for its machine learning acceleration platform
value.excerpt: OctoML, a Seattle-based startup that helps enterprises optimize and deploy their machine learning models, today announced that it has raised a $85 million Series C round led by Tiger Global Management.

value.title: Top 10 robotics stories of October
value.excerpt: DeepMind acquiring MuJoCo and Waymo's self-driving cars getting stuck on a dead-end street in SF captured your attention in October 2021.

value.title: Why Should Humankind Strive To Build Artificial General Intelligence?
